website_summaries.verdict: A great value for the price, but your child may outgrow this model faster than some of the others.
pros: Tare function subtracts weight of diapers and clothing
cons: Only goes up to 44 pounds, so it's not ideal for older toddlers
Measures in tenths of pounds instead of ounces

customer_reviews.title: Works great in spite of their inability to sit still
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cats. Works great in spite of their inability to sit still, it is able to get easily reproducible readings on them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My baby had problems gaining weight for the first month. This was a great help. Matched up to the doctors scale. Would weigh before and after bottles. Now at 4 months it’s nice to have just to get an idea of what he weighs between doctors visits. Lent it to a friend whose daughter lost a lot of weight after birth. Really gave her peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Kulp

customer_reviews.title: Measures accurately, nice surface, have to do some of your own math to get ounces correct
customer_reviews.text: Scale works well and is accurate. Very flat with slight molding. Not good for packages but great for cats and small animals that might move a bit. Only problem is that it doesn't measure ounces. So a reading of "6.8" is six pounds, eight tenths of a pound OR six pounds, 12 ounces, NOT six pounds, eight ounces. As long as you don't mind doing the extra math you're good with this scale. The price difference made it worth it to me. Have had scale for eight months with biweekly use and no problems; same batteries that came with the scale too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Great price arrived on time although did not work. I'm a rn and have used many scales before. I zeroed the scale without anything on it and waited a bit then placed the baby. It didn't recognize that anything was on it regardless what I placed the the scale UPDATE- Amazon issued a refund and prior to returning this item I received a free replacement that worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Nydia

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I nervously bought this scale to help me see how much milk my son was getting while breastfeeding. The numbers will bounce all over the place as he moves, but you will start to see 2 numbers repeat themselves, and then one number that stays for a couple seconds as baby sits relatively still. This product has given me such peace of mind! So much easier than going to hospital for a weighed feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The cat wasn’t as taken by it as I was 😂
customer_reviews.author: RoxyH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scale for Pets
customer_reviews.text: I bough for weighing my cats. One needs to lose weight, one needs to gain weight. It works perfectly. The challenge is getting the Cat to stay still!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Karen

customer_reviews.title: Scale does not show accurate weight!
customer_reviews.text: Scale is not at all accurate. Would give 0 Stars if that was an option. Needed the scale to monitor the weight of my breastfed newborn. Scale showing 1lb 4.4oz for my 7lb 5oz baby. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Beaty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE 3/31/17*** The company sent me a new scale after my previous review and it works perfectly!! I am very pleased with the scale now. Hard to get an accurate reading and not sure I can trust this scale.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: It turns off to soon, and I keep having to turn it on and wait. When your weighing puppies it's frustrating. Which is what I bought it for. It does do lbs and kgs. It's lightweight and easy to move around. If you set a box on it and then put the puppy in the box, the weight of the box will keep it on and you can get things done more easily, but then you have to subtract the weight of the box from each puppy's weight. There could be bigger problems in the world I suppose. But a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: A Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Recieved defective scale. Shows that my newborn weighs about 2 lbs. Tried all of the different setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Grefkowicz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get a stable weight reading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to weigh my cats and it's okay, but not great. They like to move around, and even when I get them to sit still the weight sensor changes every time they wag their tails, making it hard to get an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Able to weigh a wiggly feline
customer_reviews.text: This scale came promptly. I'm using it to monitor weight in a feisty cat, and it does a good job selecting a weight during the fleeting instant when he is still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend it. Got it to help my granddaughter track ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does exactly what it says and should do. Seems well made and no complaints at all. Would definitely recommend it. Got it to help my granddaughter track her daughter's weight, because she was premature.. We went thru it. I have also used it a few times so I also saw how well it worked. She loves it. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cats
customer_reviews.text: Got this to track my cats weight as they grow and it works perfectly. Its really easy to use there is no calibration just set the unit of measurement you want to use and you're good. Not sure how amazing this would be for babies seeing as it is pretty flat and I would say small for a baby. But I don't have a baby so I don't know how well one would fit on it. I would definitely say this is perfect for cats and small dogs. It struggles to get the oz but I really just need the lbs
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Works great for babies and cats!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase! I purchased it because my infant was struggling to gain weight and I wanted to be able to monitor it without unnecessary doctor visits. It seems pretty accurate, may be just a little off but there’s really no way I would know, it just helps me to know she’s gaining not loosing weight. We also use it to weight our cats, although that’s not it’s purpose, it works great. They’re on a diet so again it’s nice to monitor their weight without vet visits.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: are easy to read and appear to be pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three of these for our veterinary hospital and use them for weighing small dogs and cats. They work well, are easy to read and appear to be pretty durable. A good purchase, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Roy

customer_reviews.title: If you are just wanting a general weight and don't need it to be accurate to the ounce I'm sure this scale would be just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This scale "bounces" a lot. I was trying to use it to do pre and post breastfeeding weights. I was hoping to get an accurate weight and determine the volume of milk my baby was receiving at each feeding. Similar to what lactation specialists do. The scale bounced because my 7 week old did not hold statue still. The measurement bounced a couple of ounces which for my purpose made a big difference. If you are just wanting a general weight and don't need it to be accurate to the ounce I'm sure this scale would be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Accurate everytime, Thin and light
customer_reviews.text: We weighed our baby right before going in to the pediatrician, and it was only 0.3 oz off. It seems accurate for lower weights too, like if you have a premie (her shirt said 1.7oz (the same as the ped office). It also gives the same reliable weight if we take her off and put her back on 5 times in a row. We love the Hold button which freezes the number so we can take a picture. It seems to be the perfect size- big enough to fit her very comfortably, but very thin and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina & Cy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this scale for my sister. She would do a weigh in Wednesday every week with her little guy and share the photo (absolutely adorable). Then we found out we were expecting and this was one of the first things we bought. Absolutely love it!! It is SO easy to use and it gives so much peace of mind being able to check her weight every week. Would 100% recommend this product. Will be buying it in the future for family/friends who are expecting. Makes a great gift that people don’t usually think to ask for or purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to monitor my feline as he fights cancer. It is quick to turn on and be ready, has a large enough surface to be able to balance him on easily. The weights have been spot on and I love that it turns off on its own so that I don't have to struggle to do that while juggling my cat.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small pets
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to weigh our cats with health issues, one with pancreatitis, another with EPI & IBD, so it's important for them to maintain their weight. This scale is perfect, easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: SewingCinderella

customer_reviews.title: Great scale, very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This scale works really well, very accurate and easy to use, however I'd say the sensitivity is kind of a drawback, because it is all over the place when baby moves. It's almost better to Tare out the weight of a swaddle, swaddle your baby, and then put them on the scale.....otherwise it's kinda hard to get weight down to the exact ounce. Other than that, we use this all the time between pediatrician appointments! Great product at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: No!!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all accurate!!! I was able to accurately weigh a 3lb item, but my baby at 6-7lbs it would not weigh her accurately whatsoever. I used it to see the difference in numbers before & after feeding just to know how much she was taking in (breastfeeding). That is all. Stopped using after a couple weeks. PSA: BUY A BETTER ONE
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Diedrich

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended for people looking for weight in pounds. The scale does pounds and decimals rather than pounds and ounces. It's still an accurate number, but then you have to convert tenths of a pound to ounces yourself. Or you could just buy a scale that gives you pounds and ounces out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Lender

customer_reviews.title: Great scale!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter when they visited because she needed to have her weight checked weekly. This was cheaper than the others but I figured it was only for a few weeks when they were here. It ended up being perfect for what we needed! No need to spend a fortune when this worked just as well. Very accurate and easy and you could use a blanket on it. I even used it for my little dog who was losing weight unexpectedly. My daughter took the scale back with her and is still using it every week! Very much recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my purpose...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to keep a record of my kitty's weight and this product works for my purpose! Small footprint and easy to read, I'm happy with this purchase and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Decent baby scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is pretty decent. Not sure how accurate it truly is yet because I haven’t tested it before a doctors appt yet. But I believe If it isn’t accurate, it’s close to it. Also, for the people saying it’s weighing their baby at 1-2lbs notice they’re weighing their baby on carpet. You can’t do that with a scale. You need to weigh on a flat hard surface. So it’s wrong due to user error. I have no issues with the scale at all. I think it’s worth it for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: First one defective, but 2nd is fine
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived and seemed fine until I realized it would only register pounds plus .1 (as in 10.1 or 7.1 or 18.1, but never 10.3 or 10.5 or 10.7, etc). I contacted amazon, who helped broker a conversation with the company who replaced the item swiftly, and new one seems to work well. That said, I'm using this to weigh my cat. And it's fine for that. To be weighing a human, and really depending on it's accuracy... seems a bit flimsy, no visible metal parts, all plastic, very lightweight, hard to trust that it's really a fine precision scale. Got a baby to weigh? Think twice.
customer_reviews.author: ralph g. clark

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect. Weights are accurate to ounces and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to way newborn puppies! It was perfect. Weights are accurate to ounces and easy to see! Still using it easily on 4 week old pups! Seems like this will do well to weigh up to 8 weeks plus. This is for German shepherds who are about a pound at birth. LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Muzzfam

customer_reviews.title: Scale not level
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a quality control issue, but our scale was not level. One of the legs popped out higher than the others, so the scale stands unevenly and rocks. This creates accuracy issues and so we cannot trust what the scale reads. We are returning the scale -- thankfully Amazon's return policy is great. But we are debating whether to get another one or look into getting another brand. Other than that, the scale is nice. Very lightweight, minimalist look, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Rim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use with babies
customer_reviews.text: For babies, this has been decently accurate down to the ounces. Our daughter had a hard time gaining weight after birth and this was always within an ounce or two of the doctor and lactation scales, which of course babies weight fluctuates a few ounces all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Baby scale great for weighing smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to weigh my small (around 15 lb) dog. It’s the perfect size. I’ve taught her to step on the scale with all four feet. It seems very close in accuracy to the scale at her veterinarian. I would recommend this for keeping track of small dog weights. When ordering, make sure your dog is not longer than the width of the scale.
customer_reviews.author: mark023

customer_reviews.title: didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: not for baby or toddler weighting! babies move a lot and toddlers as well. weight is inaccurate because it doesn't hold the weight because of the baby moving and ofcourse you can't hold a baby to stay still! not worth it and I hope they return my money since I just used it a couple of times. when I saw it didn't work I wonder if I should keep it for when my baby became a toddler and that it probably would work better but now he is almot one year old and still he moves a lot and ofcourse the weight doesn't stay still to an accurate measure.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Accurate weights
customer_reviews.text: I run a small animal rescue so getting weights for dosing medications, tracking weight gains/losses is very important. Very easy to use. Nice flat area so I can place a guinea pig or rabbit on top without too much fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Ancelin Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Good general weight
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can get a general weight of my baby but I tried weighing before and after feedings and I was getting the same weight which led me to think I wasn’t producing enough milk so I pumped and bottle fed doing the same weighing before and after but was still getting the same weight. I guess it does work for some people but ours didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well for weighted nursing sessions
customer_reviews.text: We bought this scale to do before and after weighted nursing sessions with our 3 month old baby. She is already to long to easily get her whole body on the scale, making it difficult to get an accurate reading. Also, readings fluctuate a lot when baby moves arms and legs. Might work well for a premature/newborn baby that is smaller and less mobile, but isn't working well for our needs. Another thing it doesn't give readings in ounces, not a big deal bc you can do the conversion, but another thing that makes this not ideal for weighted nursing sessions.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Weight not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This scale was very wobbly. One leg was longer than the other so we had to stick something under the leg. It also was way off on the weight. I weighed cans of food to see how accurate it was and it was NOT ACCURATE. It was returned!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Returned Item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this scale so that I could weigh my breastfed baby before and after feedings. At three months old baby was already too long for the scale and given the fact that the scale is so flat his legs extended past the scale and rested on the surface the scale was on, making reading inaccurate. The scale also wouldn't stabilize to give a weight. Any movement at all keeps it from stabilizing, even baby breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This scale did’nt last. Each time I zero it out place the baby on it I would an inaccurate weight. So embarrassing. I can’t send it back because it’s to late I only tried to weigh 3 infants. None was accurate. This product gives amazon a bad rep.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Brown

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I could never even get a set weight with my moving baby. I left her on there for 2 minutes and it wouldnt stay at a set weight . kind of defeats the purpose of being a baby scale. Horrible item
customer_reviews.author: Devan Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Comes with batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to keep weight of a cat - not a baby. It seems easy to use but I haven't had the cat back to the vet to know if the weight I get with the scale is the same as what they get in their clinic, so I'm not sure about accuracy yet. It was an inexpensive model and it came with batteries to put in so it could be used immediately which I appreciated because many items say "batteries not included" and you have to go find some after an items arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Linda TH

customer_reviews.title: The product is light, feel cheap. I set ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is light, feel cheap. I set it up on a solid surface, but it start having problem after few days. Unreliable reading. Sometime after I turn it on, it try to measure something that was not there. Returned,.
customer_reviews.author: Tinh Khau

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Was questionable about buying this because reviews were all over the place. But I have had it a month and weigh my son at least once a week and it has been accurate. I make sure I put it on a flate sold surface. The bathroom tile floor. Press the on button, it zeros out itself, weigh baby, then it will turn off by itself. I keep it stored in its original box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Originally got to monitor weight of my cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Originally got to monitor weight of my cat who has now put on some pounds which is good. Plan on using for my baby in near future. Very thin and lightweight and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed- got this for my kittens who were getting bigger and not fitting in the small food scale I had (which matched up with the vets perfectly) and it is SO off. One kitten weighed 11 oz in my food scale and this one said he was only 7 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby outgrows quickly about five months
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is smaller and easy to use. I would appreciate if the measurement was in pounds and ounce, not pounds with decimals. After about five months baby does not quite fit as well on the scale. Has been nice to track growth at home.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it worked. Easy to use and accurate but it only lasted a month before it would only display “hello”. Won’t turn off either so I assume the internals have failed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and convenient when it was working. I literally used it three time since bought. Now it stopped working (when I press power button, it doesn’t turn on). I replaced the batteries. It still doesn’t respond. The quality is so poor. Too bad that I can’t return it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, slim and compact.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter did not think she would keep this item because she did not want to be a mom who always checked her child's weight. She didn't return it and has changed her mind. She absolutely loves this. It is accurate, compact and provides reassurance about her baby's growth. This is an excellent product for those who want to ensure their child is growing as expected or have concerns about whether or not they are producing enough milk for their child. Alleviates worry and anxiety
customer_reviews.author: Safety First

customer_reviews.title: very nice product. Nice big area to weigh them and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to weigh puppies, very nice product. Nice big area to weigh them and easy to use and read controls.
customer_reviews.author: JulieZ

customer_reviews.title: Worst scale ever
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, doesnt work. Wont read weight accurately or at all. Has trouble weighing anything less then 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: I weighed my baby the morning I took her to the doctor for her 2 month check up. Our measurements were within a couple oz of what the doctor had! Definitely recommend to breast feeding mommas!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't weigh my son
customer_reviews.text: Scale would not weigh my son. I tried several times. He was still while sleeping once and even then it wouldn't read. Must have been a defective scale. Bummed as I purchased to keep track of how much my son was eating while being breastfed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy scale
customer_reviews.text: worked great to weigh my litter of 14. For the first 3 weeks I weighed daily, then weekly before going to their homes. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Alesa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home weighing!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scale. I purchased it to keep track of my daughter's weight since she was born small and in the NICU. It was a decent price and is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany durham

customer_reviews.title: Literally does not work, gives very wrong weight
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. It literally doesn’t work. It keeps trying to tell me that my approximately 20 lb cat weighs 3 lbs. This is after zeroing out the scale before use. Absolutely terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: sflnative

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to weigh my cats. it's not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to weigh my cats. it's not as heavy duty as the scales at the vet but it works well and is accurate if you can get them to hold still. Some reviews I read complained that the read out was confusing because it is 1/10's of a pound instead of ounces but that doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this scale
customer_reviews.text: Pretty unimpressed by this scale. It does not give consistent readings. Depending on exactly where you place the child (or whatever you're weighing) you get a different reading. It seem that the sensors within the scale are not able to do their job accurately. I get swings of +/- 3 lbs or more. Really awful.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Scale
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive baby scale. Claims to weigh up to 40 lbs. However a 15-20 lb puppy is too bulky (and active) to fit on it. Human baby might lay more quietly. It was adequate for checking weights from week to week and to calculate approximate weight for worming doses. Got this in a pinch as we couldn't find the Exacto Beam Scale that hadn't been used in years and was somewhere in a storage shed.
customer_reviews.author: Kochevoey

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a year, now weighs everything light
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a year, then suddenly we had some cats mysteriously losing weight. No, their weight was the same, the scale was weighing them light! We can't use it now because one cat weighs 1 lb light, the other 2 lbs....so you really have no idea what it weighs! Bummer, since we liked it at first.
customer_reviews.author: glycerin10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for littles
customer_reviews.text: With my son I constantly worry about his weight because of his medical condition. So when we brought our daughter home I was worried about her weight as well. This scale is amazing and so easy to use. It sits on a small trunk/storage thing we have in our bedroom and every morning we get her weight. So glad I purchased this and it definitely gets put to use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne perry

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this to keep track of our two fat cats ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to keep track of our two fat cats weight loss. It gets the job done. Eventually. They slide all over this. Can't imagine how tricky it would be weighing an actual baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jinxie

customer_reviews.title: Nurse approved!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I’m a peds home health nurse and this thing is handy, study and easy to use. Plus I love its smooth design, makes it easy to wipe down between patients.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to keep track of my breastfed baby's weight. It works really good. The numbers change when he is moving but they give you an estimate when you press the left button.
customer_reviews.author: Eingely JS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to weigh my rabbits. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SittingOverHere

customer_reviews.title: this is worth the price and its so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this is worth the price and its so easy to use. I wanted to be able to weigh my kid whenever and not wait for each doctors appointment. needs to be placed on a hard surface like tile or wood floor. will not calculate on carpet
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get to work correctly
customer_reviews.text: Item came later then what I needed it for and then I Couldn't get this item to work so I sent back for refund
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: good product four our use
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our vet hospital to weigh smaller pets. Wish it was a little less slippery
customer_reviews.author: vetmom

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings and impossible to get consistent. Will not ...
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate readings and impossible to get consistent. Will not work well for doing weighted feeds, will barely even work to get a vague idea of your baby's current weight.
customer_reviews.author: Paige K.

customer_reviews.title: A little jumpy
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our chihuahuas and it is a little jumpy. My dog will stand there and it will flash back and forth between two VERY different numbers. Don’t think it’s super accurate.
customer_reviews.author: James Favaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great scale!! I use it for my puppies as a dog breeder works great!!
customer_reviews.author: marcy hauskins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. We bought it to weigh our infant. The feet of the scale were all unlevel so it wouldn’t sit even on a flat surface causing the numbers to bounce around making it impossible to get an accurate weight. The hold/unit button also stops working intermittently. I am returning it because it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: jstyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure it’s completely accurate but it works well enough for me to be sure my breastfed baby is growing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Harden McCay

customer_reviews.title: Mine must be broken.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and is easy to use but mine is defective. It never shows same weight and it keep dropping while the item is sitting still. I can never get accurate read on it. I will be returning it. I really wish it worked.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back immediately. Even when my baby was holding still, I couldn’t get a straightforward reading. I tried weighing a hand weight by itself and it still couldn’t give me an accurate weight.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Capeloto

customer_reviews.title: Hugely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I weighed my daughter then compared it to the doctor office, was off by 6oz! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Zad

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, works
customer_reviews.text: Used for pet weight, always matches fairly closely vet scales. Simple and reliable. Sleek and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Calaway

customer_reviews.title: Uneven feet
customer_reviews.text: The feet were uneven on the bottom which causes the scale to be significantly off
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We needed a scale to monitor our rescued family members, cats. We have a couple with weight issues that need close monitoring. This scale works great and we are very please so far. Please consider animal rescue, it will change your life as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Weighing Newborn
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for weighing my newborn. It is lightweight and easy to store when not in use. Accurate weight and the ability to measure in pounds and ounces.
customer_reviews.author: allison eugley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use to weigh babies
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this scale its telling me that my baby is 4 pounds, I know for sure he is more than that because of his last doctor's appointment. I needed a scale to measure that my baby is getting enough breastmilk not happy that it's no measuring accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Ammon Dean

customer_reviews.title: Used for newborn pups
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a litter of 5 husky pups. Worked great.Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my cats, does the job and cost very little compared to other options.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to use in a vet clinic. It is consistently inaccurate with the weight. We cannot trust the weight which is a big deal when using it to figure out medication doses. After 6 months, we no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: CCAC

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Weight is not precise as compared to other expensive brands and pediatric offices. Also hard to weight infants because weight never fixates specific reading. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: GALIMA PLETSKAYA

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money - sleek design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my puppies daily weights - it is easy to clean and has a large surface area to have them lay one - it has both grams and lbs - grams can go out to the second decimal - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Wish it came with like a little tub or something so the baby can't move or fall
customer_reviews.author: jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Baby Scale
customer_reviews.text: very nice product. I use it to weigh my cats at home. They are not fond of it ...but it works great !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine was busted
customer_reviews.text: This hasn’t worked sense I bought it. Itstotalcrapthe numbers never stop moving and every time you weightthe something the weight changes and descends. Even when we knew the weight of an item it did the same
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: To sensitive to movement
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, hard to get weight with puppies moving around
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Slim design
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use it to weigh my cats monthly. I like the slim design.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Switch measurements with the press of a button
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing to track my babies weight. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and I love that you can switch to measure in kg, lbs, and lbs Oz with the press of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Forgetmenot486

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: Using in an animal hospital very light and holds up
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Weight measurement is not accurate. I put a 10 pound thing on it and it says it only weighs 5 pounds, put something that weighs 9.5 pound and it says .27 pounds. Not accurate, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger reich

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t seem to accurately measure my baby’s weight. I have it in my bathroom and followed directions, but it doesn’t seem to be working right.
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Good scale, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale. It’s very flat so stores easily. I’m using it to monitor my cats weight. The scale is stable, not tippy, and the first time I sat my cat on it she was not scared. I placed a dish towel on the scale for softness, Tare button zeros the scale from there and kitty remains calm. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work. Wont be replacing.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work sent back. Wont buy again. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Tecadee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for weighing nursing babies or any for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not give a consistent reading. I wanted to use this for breastfeeding to see how many oz my son needed but it’s not accurate enough the oz changed when I tested with multiple items.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Barger

product_meta.title: Smart Weigh Comfort Baby Scale with 3 Weighing Modes, 44 Pound Capacity, Accurate Digital Scale for Infants, Toddlers, and Babies
feature_bullets: MADE FOR BABY: Large, smooth surface with a curved platform comfortably cradles your child
ACCURATE READINGS: Accurate readings in seconds. Can be displayed Kilograms (kg), and Pounds (lb).

EASY TO USE: For best accuracy, please place scale on a hard,flat surface. Avoid soft surface or carpet. Turn on the scale and place your baby on the scale tray. Weight will display and flash.If your Baby is moving around wait until weight is displayed and simply press the HOLD button that will lock in your babys weight.
FEATURES: Easy to use tare option allows you to put blankets on the scale for comfort. Auto off function

WARRANTY: Smart Weigh offers a 2 Year Warranty on all our products and our friendly customer service team is always ready to help with any questions or issues. When you purchase the Smart Weigh Digital Baby Scale you can be confident in your buying decision.
